TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerActionHeaderItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerActionHeaderItem Inherits DesignerActionTextItem

summary.span: 表示智慧標籤面板上的靜態標題項目。

span.span: Represents a static header item on a smart tag panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像基底類別，代表智慧標籤面板中的個別靜態文字項目。Like the base class, represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel. 不過，使用粗體文字顯示項目。However, entries are displayed using bold text. 通常，標頭項目用來在面板中建立的一組項目的標題。Typically, a header item is used to create a heading for a group of items in a panel. 按一下標頭項目會造成任何動作。Clicking on a header item causes no action. 個別的控制台項目相關聯一起以形成面板藉由呼叫方法類別。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by calling the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to： 將附加到 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string displayName) cil managed

param.name: displayName
param.span: 要在標題中顯示的文字。

span.span: The text to be displayed in the header.

summary.span: 使用提供的名稱字串，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided name string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會同時設定和屬性的值`displayName`參數和集合屬性`null`。This constructor sets both the and the properties to the value of the `displayName` parameter and sets the property to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to： 將附加到 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性`null`。This constructor sets the property to `null`. 屬性會區分大小寫。The property is case-sensitive.
